title: I don't mind Yuumi being strong
body:
It's just Janna Karma Sona don't do jack shit to her.

It's like, riot wants new champs to completely replace older champs.

Karma sucks, I would rather take an AD ryze support than have a Karma on my team.
Might as well ask for an AP shyvanna JUNGLE while we're at it. So we can have two useless players on the team.

It even feels like Soraka heals less than Yuumi does..

replies.body: Enchanters hard counter Yuumi's one poke skill tho?

This belongs in rant btw. 

{{champion:37}} literally is a counterpick to {{champion:350}} with a 57% winrate in the matchup.

{{champion:43}} is a slightly below-par support right now, but is perfectly fine.

And AP {{champion:102}} is legit. 

And {{champion:16}} outheals {{champion:350}} really easily.


Yuumi is extremely powerful and understandably tilting...but not for the reasons you are mentioning.
